categories.title: Oriental
categories.shortDescription: Oriental massages combine ancestral techniques and spiritual philosophy to balance body, mind, and energy. Discover our options and choose the perfect gift for those who need it most.

showCase.title: Choose your experience
showCase.description: Each oriental massage has a unique essence. Gift wellness, balance, and serenity.

subcategories.title: Thai Massage
subcategories.shortDescription: Experience a unique combination of stretching and pressure that revitalizes body and mind. This traditional Thai massage improves flexibility, relieves tension, and restores the natural flow of energy.
subcategories.longDescription:
Immerse yourself in an ancestral experience that awakens body and spirit. Thai Massage combines rhythmic pressure, gentle stretching, and precise movements inspired by the ancient wisdom of Southeast Asia.

Without oils, but full of intention, this massage stimulates energy channels, improves circulation, and releases accumulated tension, helping to restore the natural flow of vital energy.

A harmonious dance between strength and serenity that returns you to your center of balance, leaving a sensation of lightness, clarity, and deep inner peace.

subcategories.title: Balinese
subcategories.shortDescription: Travel to Bali without leaving the city. This massage combines gentle techniques and deep pressure to relieve stress, relax muscles, and balance body and spirit.
subcategories.longDescription:
Let yourself be transported to the exotic island of Bali, the cradle of an ancient tradition that combines the best of Hindu medicine, Ayurvedic wisdom, and ancestral oriental techniques.

The Balinese Massage harmonizes body and mind through enveloping movements, deep kneading, precise pressure, and gentle stretching, performed with hands, forearms, and even feet.

Immerse yourself in a unique sensory journey that relieves tension, stimulates circulation, and renews your vital energy.
Perfect for gifting or treating yourself to a moment of authentic peace and balance.

subcategories.title: Shiatsu
subcategories.shortDescription: Japanese Shiatsu massage works on energy meridians by applying rhythmic pressure with fingers, palms, and elbows. Its goal is to unblock vital energy, relieve pain, and harmonize the nervous system.
subcategories.longDescription:
Discover the ancient art of Shiatsu, a Japanese manual technique that uses rhythmic pressure with thumbs and palms on the body's energy points to restore natural balance and release accumulated tension.

Through gentle kneading, deep pressure, and delicate stretching, this massage stimulates vital energy (Ki), promoting a deep sense of relaxation and holistic well-being.

‚ú® Benefits:

- Relieves back, neck, and head pain (including migraines)
- Improves mobility and reduces muscle stiffness
- Helps alleviate sciatica, rheumatism, and chronic fatigue
- Favors circulation and energy balance
- Helps with menstrual, digestive, and respiratory disorders

Gift yourself‚Äîor someone else‚Äîa moment of Japanese serenity, where body and mind meet in perfect harmony.

subcategories.title: Hot Stones
subcategories.tagline: Warmth that embraces, energy that renews
subcategories.shortDescription: The warmth of volcanic stones deeply relaxes muscles, improves circulation, and dissolves accumulated tension, enveloping you in a sensation of total peace.
subcategories.longDescription:
Treat yourself to a moment of pause and well-being with the Hot Stone Massage, an ancestral technique of oriental origin that combines the touch of heat with the art of massage to deeply relax body and mind.

Hot volcanic stones glide gently over the skin, transmitting an enveloping sensation of calm and balance. The heat penetrates the muscles, relieving tension, improving circulation, and helping to release toxins and accumulated stress.

A unique sensory experience that will make you feel light, revitalized, and in total harmony.
Ideal for gifting or enjoying when you need to reconnect with yourself.

subcategories.title: Herbal Compresses
subcategories.tagline: Scents that heal, heat that relaxes
subcategories.shortDescription: Pindas, small bags of aromatic herbs and spices, are applied hot with rhythmic movements. A sensory experience that relieves tension, nourishes the skin, and revitalizes the soul.
subcategories.longDescription:
Discover a unique experience that combines traditional massage techniques with the therapeutic power of herbal pindas: small fabric bags filled with carefully selected medicinal and aromatic herbs.

When heated with steam, the pindas release their essential oils and healing properties, enveloping the body in a natural and relaxing aroma that calms the mind and relieves muscle tension.

A massage that nourishes the skin, stimulates the senses, and renews vital energy, inviting you into a deep state of well-being and serenity.

categories.title: Relaxing
categories.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in a haven of calm where time stands still and the body breathes in harmony. Soft scents, the warmth of aromatic candles, and the synchronized touch of a 4-hands massage envelop the senses in serenity. Each session is a caress for the soul, a whisper that dissolves stress and returns inner peace.

showCase.title: Choose your experience
showCase.description: Each relaxing massage is a pause for the soul. Gift calm, tenderness, and a moment of respite.

subcategories.title: Relaxing Massage
subcategories.shortDescription: The slow, enveloping rhythm of this massage calms the mind, soothes the body, and restores harmony. Ideal for leaving stress behind and letting serenity flow like a sigh over the skin.
subcategories.longDescription:
When the pace of daily life accelerates, gift yourself a moment of calm. The Relaxing Massage is designed to help you disconnect from stress, relieve tension, and recover harmony between body and mind.

Through gentle and enveloping movements, this massage wraps you in a sensation of deep tranquility, promoting rest, circulation, and general well-being.

Ideal for those looking to stop time for a few moments and feel balanced again.

subcategories.title: Aromatherapy
subcategories.tagline: Fragrances that balance body and soul
subcategories.shortDescription: Essential aromas envelop your senses while gentle movements dissolve tension and awaken inner serenity. Each breath becomes a whisper of well-being and balance.
subcategories.longDescription:
Let yourself be enveloped by a dance of aromas and sensations that transport you far from daily stress. The Aromatherapy Massage combines the power of relaxing touch with natural essential oils, carefully selected to stimulate your senses and renew your inner energy.

Each fragrance acts on body and mind, helping to reduce stress, regulate blood pressure, improve digestion, and strengthen the immune system.

A multi-sensory experience that restores calm, awakens vitality, and leaves a lasting sensation of balance and well-being.

subcategories.title: Aromatic Candles
subcategories.shortDescription: Warm shea wax transforms into a silky balm that caresses the skin, nourishing it deeply. Hands glide in harmony, freeing the body from stiffness and leaving a trail of perfume and peace.
subcategories.longDescription:
Stress, fatigue, insomnia‚Ä¶ sound familiar?
Say goodbye to those tensions with a stimulating and delicate massage performed with an aromatic oil candle that, upon melting, transforms into a warm, soft elixir for the skin.

The atmosphere fills with light, aroma, and serenity, inviting you to deep and restorative rest. Ideal for all skin types and any area of the body, this treatment nourishes, hydrates, and reconnects body and mind.

‚ú® Benefits: improves circulation, regulates heart rate and blood pressure, reduces stress, and strengthens the immune system.

A unique sensory experience that will leave you renewed inside and out.

subcategories.title: Craniofacial
subcategories.tagline: Free your mind, renew your expression
subcategories.shortDescription: Through gentle pressure and movements on the scalp, neck, and shoulders, this massage releases accumulated tension, improves circulation, and awakens a sense of clarity and inner lightness.
subcategories.longDescription:
Daily tension often accumulates in the neck, scalp, and face, generating stiffness and fatigue. The Craniofacial Massage helps release these tensions through gentle pressure and rhythmic movements that relax facial muscles and stimulate circulation.

This treatment not only relieves mental stress but also brightens the face, improves oxygenation, and leaves an immediate sensation of lightness and well-being.

Perfect for those seeking mental clarity, deep rest, and a renewed look.

subcategories.title: Four Hands
subcategories.shortDescription: Four hands move in complete synchrony, creating a symphony of caresses that envelopes the body in a wave of sensations. An immersive and unique experience that multiplies pleasure and relaxation.
subcategories.longDescription:
Imagine two therapists working in total synchrony, combining fluid movements, pressure, and stretching in a perfectly balanced choreography. The result: a unique experience that multiplies relaxation and well-being.

The Four Hands Massage envelopes the body in a harmonious rhythm that dissolves tension, stimulates circulation, and leads the mind to a state of deep calm.
A sensation so enveloping that time seems to stand still.

Ideal for those seeking an exclusive, sensory, and absolutely unforgettable treatment.
Double the hands, double the pleasure.

subcategories.title: Anti-stress
subcategories.shortDescription: With techniques combining gentle pressure and deep breathing, this massage helps release emotional and physical blockages. Each movement dissolves fatigue, inviting tranquility and restorative rest.
subcategories.longDescription:
Need to disconnect and let go of the tension accumulated from day-to-day life?
The Anti-stress Massage is specially designed to relax the neck, shoulders, and back, the areas where physical and emotional burdens concentrate most.

Through firm and precise movements, this treatment dissolves muscle knots, improves circulation, and provides an immediate sensation of lightness and well-being.

Ideal for those looking to recover energy, serenity, and deep rest.
‚ú® Leave the rush behind‚Ä¶ and feel balanced again.

categories.title: Therapeutic
categories.shortDescription: Therapeutic massages are a journey toward recovery and inner balance. Through conscious touch, they relieve tension, reactivate energy, and return harmony to the body. An experience that nourishes, repairs, and renews from deep within.

showCase.title: Choose your experience
showCase.description: Each therapeutic massage is a gesture of care. Gift relief, strength, and lasting well-being.

subcategories.title: Deep Tissue
subcategories.shortDescription: A deep massage that releases muscle stiffness, relieves knots and tension, improves circulation, and relaxes the nervous system. Leaves an immediate sensation of well-being, lightness, and vitality.
subcategories.longDescription:
After long hours in the same position, muscles tighten and annoying knots appear.
This deep and precise massage releases muscle stiffness, relieves pain, and returns your body to its natural lightness.
You will leave with a pleasant sensation of well-being and freedom in every movement.

Benefits: relieves muscle knots, improves circulation, reduces accumulated tension, relaxes the nervous system, and brings an immediate sense of rest and vitality.

subcategories.title: Pregnancy Massage
subcategories.tagline: Care and well-being during a unique stage
subcategories.shortDescription: Prenatal massage that relieves lower back pain, tired legs, and fluid retention. Relaxes muscles, improves circulation, reduces stress and swelling, offering well-being, serenity, and a special connection with your baby.
subcategories.longDescription:
Pregnancy is a wonderful stage, but it can also bring physical discomforts like lower back pain, tired legs, or fluid retention. This massage is specially designed to relieve those discomforts and help you fully enjoy this special moment.

Through gentle and safe movements, it relaxes muscles involved in childbirth, improves circulation, reduces swelling, and promotes rest.

‚ú® Benefits: relief from joint pain and cramps, improved intestinal transit, prevention of stretch marks, stress reduction, and a general feeling of lightness, serenity, and connection with your baby.

subcategories.title: Pregnancy (Tired Legs)
subcategories.shortDescription: Prenatal massage for tired legs that reduces swelling, cramps, and heaviness. Improves circulation, relieves muscles, promotes rest and well-being, providing lightness, relaxation, and connection with your baby.
subcategories.longDescription:
The countdown to your big day has begun‚Ä¶ and your body deserves a break.
This massage, specially designed for tired legs during pregnancy, helps reduce swelling, improve circulation, and relieve cramps and heaviness.

Through gentle, draining movements, it provides an immediate sensation of lightness and rest, helping you reconnect with your physical and emotional well-being.

‚ú® Benefits: reduction of swelling and fluid retention, relief from joint and muscle pain, improved rest, circulation, and posture, as well as prevention of stretch marks and stress reduction.

A necessary treat for you and your baby, during such a special stage.

subcategories.title: Back, Neck & Shoulders
subcategories.tagline: Relief in the most tense areas
subcategories.shortDescription: Massage focused on the back, neck, and shoulders that relieves knots and stiffness. Improves posture and mobility, reduces stress and discomfort, providing an immediate sensation of well-being, lightness, and deep relaxation.
subcategories.longDescription:
Daily tensions tend to accumulate right there: in the back, neck, and shoulders. This massage focuses on releasing those key areas, relieving knots, reducing stiffness, and returning a pleasant sensation of lightness and well-being.

Benefits: deep relaxation of dorsal and cervical muscles, relief from pain and discomfort, improved posture and mobility, and reduction of accumulated stress.

subcategories.title: Lomi-Lomi
subcategories.tagline: The spirit of Hawaii in your hands
subcategories.shortDescription: Hawaiian Lomi-Lomi massage with rhythmic and enveloping movements that relieve tension, relax muscles and the nervous system, improve circulation and lymphatic drainage, providing well-being, harmony, lightness, and inner balance.
subcategories.longDescription:
The most pleasant way to travel to Hawaii without getting on a plane.
Lomi-Lomi Massage, also known as ‚Äúloving hands massage‚Äù, combines rhythmic and enveloping movements performed with hands and forearms, simulating the flow of ocean waves.

This ancestral Hawaiian technique releases deep tensions, relaxes the nervous and muscular systems, and favors circulation and lymphatic drainage, bringing a sensation of balance, lightness, and inner harmony.

‚ú® Benefits: stress reduction, improved flexibility, body toning, relief from muscle pain, and stimulation of the immune system.

subcategories.title: Tired Legs
subcategories.shortDescription: Specialized massage for tired legs that improves circulation, relieves swelling, heaviness, and cramps, relaxes feet and legs, prevents varicose veins, and returns an immediate sensation of lightness and well-being.
subcategories.longDescription:
Whether you spend the day standing or sitting, your legs eventually feel the effort: they swell, feel heavy, and ask for rest. This specialized massage will help you reactivate circulation, relieve tension, and give them back the lightness they need.

Benefits: stimulation of blood circulation, relief from heaviness and swelling, reduction of cramps, relaxation of feet and legs, and prevention of varicose veins.

subcategories.title: Reflexology
subcategories.shortDescription: Foot reflexology stimulates specific points on the feet to relieve tension, reduce physical and mental stress, improve general well-being and energy circulation, providing vitality, lightness, and inner harmony.
subcategories.longDescription:
Foot Reflexology is an ancient technique that applies precise pressure to specific points on the feet, which are connected to different organs and systems of the body.

By stimulating these reflex zones, energy circulation is encouraged, tensions are reduced, and physical and mental stress is alleviated, helping the organism recover its natural balance.

A deeply relaxing experience that renews vitality, improves general well-being, and leaves a sensation of lightness and inner harmony.

categories.title: Firming
categories.shortDescription: Firming massages stimulate the skin and awaken the vital energy that inhabits every fiber. Through firm and enveloping movements, they activate circulation, tone tissues, and return the body to its natural form of harmony and strength.

showCase.title: Choose your experience
showCase.description: Each firming massage is a revitalizing caress. Gift firmness, beauty, and renewal from within.

subcategories.title: Wood Therapy
subcategories.shortDescription: Wood therapy uses wooden tools to tone muscles, improve circulation and lymph flow, reduce tension and cellulite, and promote relaxation and well-being, providing firmness, lightness, and a sense of body balance.
subcategories.longDescription:
Wood Therapy is a massage technique originating from oriental tradition that uses wooden tools specifically designed to work on muscles and skin.
Through rhythmic and precise movements, these tools help tone muscles, improve blood and lymphatic circulation, promote fluid drainage, and reduce the appearance of cellulite.

This massage not only acts on a physical level but also induces deep relaxation, releasing accumulated tension and returning a sensation of lightness and well-being. It is ideal for those seeking a treatment that is natural, aesthetic, and therapeutic at the same time.

‚ú® Benefits: tones muscles, improves circulation, reduces cellulite, favors lymphatic drainage, relieves tension, provides firmness, lightness, and a sensation of body balance.

categories.title: Rituals
categories.shortDescription: Complete experiences combining the best of our techniques. Designed to reset body and mind through a perfect sequence of treatments.

showCase.title: Choose your Ritual
showCase.description: More than a massage, a complete journey of renewal.

subcategories.title: Total Harmony Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: A complete 90-minute immersion combining full body massage with cranial relaxation and foot reflexology.
subcategories.longDescription:
This is our most complete ritual for those who need a total reset.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Full Body Massage (Oriental or Relaxing)
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage (relieves mental stress)
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology (balances internal energy)

A 90-minute journey that leaves no tension unresolved.

subcategories.title: Luxury Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: Our most exclusive experience. 90 minutes of body massage complemented by cranial and reflexology techniques.
subcategories.longDescription:
The crown jewel of our menu. Two full hours dedicated exclusively to you.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 90 Minutes: Extended Full Body Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology

The ultimate gift for someone special, or the treat you deserve.

subcategories.title: Deep Recovery Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: Strong relief for muscle pain. 60 minutes of deep tissue massage plus cranial and reflexology to unwind.
subcategories.longDescription:
Ideal for those with accumulated fatigue and muscle stiffness.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Deep Tissue (Decontracting) Massage to release knots
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology

A powerful combination that treats physical pain while calming the nervous system.

subcategories.title: Deep Balance Ritual
subcategories.tagline: Extended care for body and mind
subcategories.shortDescription: Extended combination of 60 minutes massage plus 30 minutes of specific therapy (Reflexology or Cranial).
subcategories.longDescription:
Allow yourself time to truly let go. This ritual extends the experience to ensure deep relaxation.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Full Body Massage
‚Ä¢ 30 Minutes: Choice of Foot Reflexology or Craniofacial Massage

Ideal for treating specific ailments while relaxing the whole body.

subcategories.title: Essential Wellness Pack
subcategories.shortDescription: Combine a full-hour massage with a specific treatment of your choice: Cranial, Reflexology, or Tired Legs.
subcategories.longDescription:
Design your own moment of peace. Start with a solid base of 60 minutes of massage and add that extra touch your body needs today.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Massage of choice
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: FREE add-on (Choose: Craniofacial, Reflexology, or Tired Legs)

Perfect for a complete treatment at an exceptional price.

subcategories.title: Relief Express Pack
subcategories.shortDescription: Focused care for back pain and stress. 30 minutes of deep tissue work followed by head and foot relaxation.
subcategories.longDescription:
Don't have 90 minutes but need deep relief? This pack condenses the benefits of our recovery ritual.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 30 Minutes: Deep Tissue (Decontracting) focused on the back
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology

Efficient, effective, and restorative.

subcategories.title: Express Reset
subcategories.shortDescription: Smart relaxation: 45 minutes of intense work plus 10 minutes of targeted gift massage.
subcategories.longDescription:
Don't have much time but need relief? This pack is designed for efficiency.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 45 Minutes: Therapeutic or Relaxing Massage
‚Ä¢ 10 Minutes: Localized massage bonus

An hour of self-care that fits into any schedule.

subcategories.title: Silhouette & Wood Therapy
subcategories.shortDescription: The perfect balance between aesthetics and relaxation. Wood therapy to tone and manual massage to relax.
subcategories.longDescription:
Why choose between beauty and wellness?

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 30 Minutes: Wood Therapy (Firming/Anti-cellulite)
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Relaxing or Circulatory Massage

A combination that leaves you feeling lighter and looking firmer.

subcategories.title: Firming Express
subcategories.shortDescription: A fast-paced beauty and wellness combo. 30 minutes of vigorous wood therapy and 30 minutes of massage.
subcategories.longDescription:
The lighter version of our Silhouette pack.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 30 Minutes: Wood Therapy (Focus on legs/abdomen)
‚Ä¢ 30 Minutes: Manual Massage

Get the benefits of toning and relaxation in just one hour.

subcategories.title: New Mom Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: A gentle 75-minute session designed for the postpartum stage. Relaxing massage plus specific care for legs or head.
subcategories.longDescription:
You have taken care of everything, now let us take care of you. A ritual designed for the physical and emotional recovery of new mothers.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 60 Minutes: Gentle, relaxing massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Choice of Tired Legs (drainage) or Craniofacial

A moment of silence, peace, and reconnection with your body.

subcategories.title: Total Lightness Trio
subcategories.shortDescription: A unique combination focusing on extremities. Reflexology, Cranial, and Tired Legs massage.
subcategories.longDescription:
Perfect for those who prefer not to have a back massage or cannot receive one (e.g., pregnancy). This ritual focuses on the peripheral systems to induce deep relaxation.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Tired Legs Massage

Experience a sensation of floating and total lightness.

subcategories.title: Head to Toe Mini Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: Short on time? 30 minutes to reset. Cranial massage to clear the mind and reflexology to ground the body.
subcategories.longDescription:
The perfect break in a busy day. We work on the two poles of the body to balance your energy instantly.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Craniofacial Massage
‚Ä¢ 15 Minutes: Foot Reflexology

Maximum effect in minimum time.

subcategories.title: Independent Duo Ritual
subcategories.shortDescription: Enjoy a 90-minute massage at the same time as your companion, but in separate cabins for total privacy.
subcategories.longDescription:
Ideal for couples or friends who want to go to the spa together but prefer to enjoy the treatment in their own private space.

**What is included?**
‚Ä¢ 90 Minutes: Massage of choice for Person A (Cabin 1)
‚Ä¢ 90 Minutes: Massage of choice for Person B (Cabin 2)

*Note: This service is performed in separate rooms at the same time.*

subcategories.title: Anti-stress Promo
subcategories.shortDescription: Our signature Anti-stress massage at a special promotional price. Release tension and save.
subcategories.longDescription:
The Anti-stress Massage is specially designed to relax the neck, shoulders, and back.

**Special Offer:**
Enjoy this treatment with a special discount included in the price.

Ideal for those looking to recover energy, serenity, and deep rest.
